H0.text: Human activities are what experts estimate to be the cause for the extinction of hundreds of species every year.

H1.text: Migration is the cause that experts estimate for the extinction of hundreds of species every year.

H2.text: Predation is what experts estimate causes the extinction of hundreds of species every year.

H3.text: Intraspecies competition is what experts estimate to be the cause for the extinction of hundreds of species every year.

A4.text: Overfishing is the main driver of mass species extinction in oceans.

A5.text: Human activities have a strong and detrimental influence on marine biodiversity.
